text: lear degeneration - Confusion - Depression - Diabetes mellitus - Focal motor seizures - Horizontal nystagmus - Nephropathy - Personality changes - Photomyoclonic seizures - Progressive sensorineural hearing impairment - Slowed slurred speech - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rou
